Actions.Name: Smash
Actions.Effects: Shove 1. If either foe or this character is bloodied, increase shove to 3.

Actions.Name: Rampage
Actions.Effects: The beast dashes up to 2 spaces. When it ends this movement, adjacent foes take 2 damage and is shoved 1.

Actions.Name: Charge
Effects: The beast chooses a foe in range 2. At the end of that foe's next turn, the beast dashes up to 5 spaces towards that foe, phasing through characters. Characters the beast passes through are shoved 1 to either side and take [fray] damage. If the beasts ends this movement adjacent to their foe, that foe must save or take 2[D]+[fray] and become stunned, or [D]+[fray] only on a successful save.
This ability has no recharge if the beast is bloodied.

Actions.Name: Bellow
Actions.Description: A foe in range 2 is shoved 1. If the beast is bloodied, all foes in range 2 are shoved 1 instead.
